metas.name: Jurassic World: Rebirth
metas.description: Five years post-Jurassic World: Dominion (2022), an expedition braves isolated equatorial regions to extract DNA from three massive prehistoric creatures for a groundbreaking medical breakthrough.
cast: and Mahershala Ali in Jurassic World: Rebirth (2025)

metas.name: Mahavatar Narsimha
metas.description: The demon Hiranyakashyap seeks revenge on Vishnu and declares himself a god. His son Prahlad remains devoted to Vishnu. Vishnu manifests as Narsimha to defeat the demon and restore balance.

metas.name: War 2
metas.description: Things get complicated when Kabir Dhaliwal, a secret agent, is accused of betraying his nation and his former batchmate Vikram is assigned the task of finding him.

metas.name: Tehran
metas.description: After a 2012 Delhi bombing, officer RK's Tehran mission turns deadly when Iran targets him and India abandons him in his quest to expose the truth.

metas.name: Coolie
metas.description: Delves into a man's relentless quest for vengeance since youth, driven by righting past wrongs, shaping his very existence. Viewers experience the complexities of his tumultuous vendetta journey.

metas.name: Saiyaara
metas.description: Vaani and Krish will have to navigate life, their problems, their insecurities to hopefully realise that only love can be the answer to everything.

metas.name: Sitaare Zameen Par
metas.description: After a DUI, an arrogant basketball coach must train Neurodivergent adults for community service. His initial prejudice fades as his players show him a new perspective on life.
cast: Aamir Khan in Sitaare Zameen Par (2025)

metas.name: Dhadak 2
metas.description: A searing romantic drama about identity, power, and the cost of love in the world we live in.
cast: Siddhant Chaturvedi and Triptii Dimri in Dhadak 2 (2025)

metas.name: War Horse
metas.description: A young farm boy enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. His hopeful journey takes him out of England and onto the front lines as the war rages on.

metas.name: Housefull 5
metas.description: In this murder mystery comedy, several imposters claiming to be the son of a recently deceased billionaire compete for his fortune aboard a luxury cruise ship.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: A man fighting in a war against aliens must relive the same day every time he dies until he can find a way to stop their power source with the help of an elite soldier.
cast: Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt in Edge of Tomorrow (2014)

metas.name: Kingdom
metas.description: An undercover police constable is plunged into Sri Lanka on a covert mission to dismantle a powerful syndicate-only to discover its mastermind is his estranged brother, forcing him to confront family loyalty, and the moral cost of duty.

metas.name: 12th Fail
metas.description: The real-life story of IPS Officer Manoj Kumar Sharma and IRS Officer Shraddha Joshi.

metas.name: Su from So
metas.description: In a quiet village, a boy's innocent crush unleashes strange events that have everyone convinced he's brought a ghost along with his feelings

metas.name: The Ritual
metas.description: Two priests, one in crisis with his faith and the other confronting a turbulent past, must overcome their differences to perform a risky exorcism.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.
cast: George MacKay and Dean-Charles Chapman in 1917 (2019)

metas.name: 3BHK
metas.description: A middle-class family battles financial hurdles and personal setbacks while pursuing their dream of owning a home in the bustling city.

metas.name: The Help
metas.description: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.
cast: and Emma Stone in The Help (2011)

metas.name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
metas.description: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.
cast: and Karen Gillan in Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017)

metas.name: Oho Enthan Baby
metas.description: After Meera discovers his issues and leaves, filmmaker Ashwin channels his pain into a movie script. While pitching it, he questions if he wants this ending for his real story.

metas.name: Long Distance
metas.description: It follows an asteroid miner who, after crash-landing on an alien planet, must make his way across the harsh terrain, running out of oxygen, hunted by strange creatures, to the only other survivor.
cast: Naomi Scott and Anthony Ramos in Long Distance (2024)

metas.name: 3 Idiots
metas.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

metas.name: Ready Player One
metas.description: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.
cast: and Philip Zhao in Ready Player One (2018)

metas.name: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
metas.description: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.
cast: Charlie Hunnam in King Arthur: Legend of the Sword (2017)

metas.name: Home
metas.description: Oh, a lovable misfit alien, runs away from his planet and takes shelter on Earth, where he befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy.

metas.name: Kuberaa
metas.description: A beggar undergoes a dramatic transformation, exploring themes of greed, ambition, and moral dilemmas faced by the characters leading to a quest for redemption.

metas.name: Tron: Legacy
metas.description: The son of a computer programmer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.
cast: and Garrett Hedlund in Tron: Legacy (2010)

metas.name: War
metas.description: Kabir, a secret agent, goes rogue after a mission to catch a terrorist goes awry. However, his boss sends Khalid, another agent and his student, to track him down.
cast: Hrithik Roshan and Tiger Shroff in War (2019)

metas.name: RRR
metas.description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

metas.name: The Happening
metas.description: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.
cast: and Ashlyn Sanchez in The Happening (2008)

metas.name: The Last Voyage of the Demeter
metas.description: A crew sailing from Varna (Bulgaria) by the Black Sea to England find that they are carrying very dangerous cargo.
cast: Javier Botet in The Last Voyage of the Demeter (2023)

metas.name: Ronth
metas.description: Two patrol officers face mounting tensions during a night shift as they navigate dangerous calls while confronting their strained partnership and personal demons.

metas.name: J.S.K - Janaki V v/s State of Kerala
metas.description: Film tells the story of Janaki who becomes the victim of an inhuman activity, her unexpected encounter with Adv. David Abel Donovan and how she fights for her justice challenging the court and the judiciary system of India.
cast: J.S.K - Janaki V v/s State of Kerala (2025)

metas.name: Zero Dark Thirty
metas.description: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

metas.name: Maharaja
metas.description: A barber seeks vengeance after his home is burglarized, cryptically telling police his "lakshmi" has been taken, leaving them uncertain if it's a person or object. His quest to recover the elusive "lakshmi" unfolds.

metas.name: Maalik
metas.description: Maalik is a gangster drama starring Rajkummar Rao that is expected to be a gripping story about a man's rise to power in the underworld. The film is based on social issues and is expected to be full of action and adventure.

metas.name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
metas.description: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
cast: and Paula Patton in Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol (2011)

metas.name: Slumdog Millionaire
metas.description: When a teenager from the slums of Mumbai is interrogated about his suspicious performance on a quiz show, he revisits various events from his past to explain how he knew all the answers.
cast: and Freida Pinto in Slumdog Millionaire (2008)

metas.name: The Fabelmans
metas.description: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.
cast: and Julia Butters in The Fabelmans (2022)

metas.name: Real Steel
metas.description: In a near future where robot boxing is a top sport, a struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

metas.name: Bridge of Spies
metas.description: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.
cast: Tom Hanks in Bridge of Spies (2015)

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

metas.name: Jumanji: The Next Level
metas.description: In Jumanji: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own, the players will have to brave parts unknown from arid deserts to snowy mountains, to escape the world's most dangerous game.
cast: and Karen Gillan in Jumanji: The Next Level (2019)

metas.name: The Bourne Supremacy
metas.description: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.
cast: Matt Damon in The Bourne Supremacy (2004)

metas.name: Metro in Dino
metas.description: Follows stories of bittersweet relationships in a contemporary setting, exploring various aspects, hues, and moods of love.
cast: and Sara Ali Khan in Metro in Dino (2025)

metas.name: Lincoln
metas.description: As the Civil War rages on, U.S President Abraham Lincoln struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on his decision to emancipate the slaves.

metas.name: Tourist Family
metas.description: A quirky Sri Lankan family seeking a fresh start in India transforms a disconnected neighborhood into a vibrant community with their infectious love and kindness.

metas.name: Dhumketu
metas.description: A tea estate manager in North Sikkim loses his job, facing limited work options in the hills. He strives to support his family and restore happiness amid financial hardship.

metas.name: Extraction
metas.description: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

metas.name: Life of Pi
metas.description: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.
cast: Suraj Sharma in Life of Pi (2012)
